name: Marvin Yancy
description: '''Marvin Jerome Yancy''' (May 31, 1950 â€“ March 22, 1985) was an American [[gospel music]]ian, [[pastor]] and [[Grammy Award|Grammy]]-winning [[record producer]], and former pastor of Fountain of Life Baptist Church. He started his music career, in 1971, with [[The Independents (vocal group)|The Independents]], who were an [[Americans|American]] [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]] [[vocal group]]. His lone solo album, ''Heavy Load'', was released on January 1, 1985, by [[Nashboro Records]], and it placed at No. 4 on the [[Billboard (magazine)|''Billboard'' magazine]] [[Top Gospel Albums|Gospel Albums]] chart.
